title: How to pray when dajjal comes when 1 day would be equivalent to a year? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: hadith of the prophet haslam about the dajjal when the antichrist comes the dajjal and he spends one day that is equivalent to a whole year meaning the sun takes a whole year to set so the companions asked how should we pray o prophet of allah so the prophet said alaihis you should give it its due estimate so you should estimate in these 360 days each day five times a day to pray
